dscp.help: Differentiated Services Code Point (DSCP) value to advertise.
dscp.name: dscp

priority.help: 802.1P CoS/PCP to advertise (0 - 7; from lowest to highest priority).
priority.name: priority

options.help: Disable advertising this LLDP network policy.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable advertising this LLDP network policy.
options.name: enable

options.help: Advertise that untagged frames should be used.
options.name: none

options.help: Advertise that 802.1Q (VLAN) tagging should be used.
options.name: dot1q

options.help: Advertise that 802.1P priority tagging (VLAN 0) should be used.
options.name: dot1p
